channel.title: SevenAtSevenSportsAndEntertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSportsAndEntertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A24's New Horror Movie Looks Like The Perfect Follow-Up To Record-Breaking $91 Million Hit
item.description: A24's new horror movie already seems to have the potential to become the perfect follow-up to an acclaimed, record-breaking $91 million hit from 2023.

item.title: Sentry vs. The Avengers: Who Would Actually Win?
item.description: Thunderbolts* introduces Lewis Pullman's Sentry as one of the MCU's most powerful characters, virtually on the same power level as all the Avengers.

item.title: I'm Convinced The MCU Just Gave Sentry A Major Power Downgrade Based On 1 Thunderbolts* Line
item.description: Thunderbolts* introduced the equivalent of DC's Superman to the MCU, but I think Marvel Studios nerfed his powers thanks to one important line.
